# Simple Linear Model

We remember that

$$\yellow{Y_i} = \beta_0 + \beta_1 \orange{X_i} + \green{\varepsilon_i}$$
with

- .yellow[reponse variable]
- .orange[predictor variable]
- .green[error term]
